notes.text:
An update is now available for Red Hat build of Eclipse Vert.x.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability. For more information, see the CVE pages listed in the References section.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
This release of Red Hat build of Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.7 GA includes security updates. For more information, see the release notes listed in the References section.

Security Fix(es):

* jackson-databind: denial of service via a large depth of nested objects (CVE-2020-36518)

* com.google.code.gson-gson: Deserialization of Untrusted Data in com.google.code.gson-gson (CVE-2022-25647)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgements, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
notes.title: Details

product.product_id: Red Hat build of Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.7

notes.text: A flaw was found in the Jackson Databind package. This cause of the issue is due to a Java StackOverflow exception and a denial of service via a significant depth of nested objects.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: jackson-databind: denial of service via a large depth of nested objects
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: CodeReady Studio is no longer supported and therefore this flaw will not be addressed in CodeReady Studio.
notes.title: Statement

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

fixed: Red Hat build of Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.7

remediations.details:
Before applying the update, back up your existing installation, including all applications, configuration files, databases and database settings, and so on.

The References section of this erratum contains a download link for the update. You must be logged in to download the update.
product_ids: Red Hat build of Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.7

products: Red Hat build of Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.7

vulnerabilities.title: jackson-databind: denial of service via a large depth of nested objects

notes.text: A flaw was found in gson, which is vulnerable to Deserialization of Untrusted Data via the writeReplace() method in internal classes. This issue may lead to availability attacks.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
